game.name: A Totally Realistic Stealth Game
game.shortDescription: Become a stealth soldier fighting through enemy lines using whatever methods you see fit to stay undetected in this first-person shooter. Take a slow, methodical approach or go guns-blazing; as long as you remain undiscovered, any means to success is viable.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become a stealth soldier fighting through enemy lines using whatever methods you see fit to stay undetected in this first-person shooter. Take a slow, methodical approach or go guns-blazing; as long as you remain undiscovered, any means to success is viable.
